title: Nutriota Royal Jelly | 350 mg (120 Capsules)
aboutContent: WHY BUY NUTRIOTA ROYAL JELLY IN 350 MG CAPSULES? Each serving contains 350mg of royal jelly, a superfood that contributes to normal immune system function and improves overall vitality. The product is suitable for vegetarians. Each bottle contains 120 capsules, offering excellent value. HIGH QUALITY - Our supplement meets GMP standards, produced in certified factories in line with UK and EU regulations.
descriptionContent: Royal jelly is a natural bee product produced by honey bees to feed the queen and larvae. It is rich in unique proteins, fatty acids, and vitamins including B1, B2, B3, B5, B7, B8, and B9. It offers numerous health benefits: it supports normal immune system function, helps naturally improve energy levels and overall vitality, and acts as a powerful antioxidant to help fight free radicals and reduce oxidative damage.
ingredientsContent: 3:1 extract of royal jelly, hydroxypropyl methylcellulose (capsule shell), microcrystalline cellulose, dicalcium phosphate (bulking agent), magnesium stearate, silicon dioxide (anti-caking agent).
generalInfoContent:
• Package Dimensions: 10.9 x 5.3 x 5.2 cm; 198.41 g
• Units: 120 Count
• Brand: Nutriota

• Age Range Description: Adult
